tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE legal_opinions (
   opinion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   issue_title VARCHAR(255),
   expert_name VARCHAR(100),
   commentary TEXT,
   publication_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE expert_opinions (
  expert_opinion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(100),
  date_published DATE,
  content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE legal_commentaries (
  commentary_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  commentator VARCHAR(100),
  date_commented DATE,
  analysis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    opinion_id INT,
    commenter TEXT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (opinion_id) REFERENCES opinions(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Research (
  research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  issue_id INT,
  expert_id INT,
  research_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (issue_id) REFERENCES LegalIssues(issue_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (expert_id) REFERENCES Experts(expert_id)
);

CREATE TABLE opinions (
    opinion_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    expert_id UUID REFERENCES experts(expert_id),
    topic VARCHAR,
    content TEXT,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    opinion_id UUID REFERENCES opinions(opinion_id),
    commenter_name VARCHAR,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE research (
    research_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR,
    research_topic VARCHAR,
    research_content TEXT,
    research_date TIMESTAMP
);
